text:
Sometimes, parents live their dreams through their kids and now, actress Bhagyashree, who was a popular heroine of her time, has opened up about the same. Her son Abhimanyu is all set to make his big debut and the film is going to release soon.
In an interview with Mumbai Mirror, she expressed her excitement of watching her son's film in the theatre even after never having watched her own.
Not many know, Abhimanyu Dassani had to go through nine months of three-hour training, and he sustained several injuries during shoots.As a mother, she recalled that when Mard Ko Dard Nahi Hota screened at the Mumbai Film Festival (MAMI), Bhagyashree, there were long queues outside the two theatres. She said,

“Both ran to full houses and they had to eventually screen it in five theatres. I couldn't stop crying. I didn't see my own film in the theatres 30 years ago. Today, I'm living that excitement and anticipation through my son."
title: Bhagyashree Gets Emotional After Watching Son Abhimanyu's Debut 'Mard Ko Dard Nahi Hota'
